appDescription.message: Chrome multi-threaded downloader extension,based on Aria2 and AriaNg.

optionsIfIntercept.message: Automatically intercept download tasks to Aria2c,Use Camtd to take over Chrome's default download behavior.

optionsFileSize.message: The minimum file size to intercept (MB)
